attributes.action: Get The Covid19 Jabs Rolled Out Fast And The Jabs done 24/7
attributes.additional_details: If we get as many people vaccinated fast then this crisis would end fast in weeks possibly especially if people could have the vaccination for children Covid19 24 hours a day 7 days a week.  Just do everyone who they are and mark each person off the list once been vaccinated and give them proof they have had it then everything could open up again and get back to normal fast.  This has gone on too long now and people are getting fed up with waiting
attributes.background: To get as many Covid19 vaccinations manufactured fast so GPS and Health Centres have enough, then give them out to as many people fast and have them being given out 24 hours seven days a week to end this crisis fast.  Just do anyone who ever they are

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/565197
